thread.title: Bollywood star named Tourism New Zealand’s ambassador
thread.title_full: Bollywood star named Tourism New Zealand’s ambassador

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Bollywood star named Tourism New Zealand’s ambassador
text:
Bollywood star named Tourism New Zealand’s ambassador   10, 2015 Sidharth Malhotra named Tourism New Zealand’s ambassador for India eTN   
MUMBAI, India - Sidharth Malhotra was recently announced as Tourism New Zealand’s ambassador for India and the actor says he is looking forward to visit the beautiful country.The 30-year-old “Brothers” actor is the first Indian ambassador for Tourism New Zealand. 
“Excited to visit this beautiful country New Zealand as their tourism ambassador for India #NzMustDo #SidNZ let’s go!” Sidharth posted on twitter.Steven Dixon, Regional Manager – South and South East Asia at Tourism New Zealand had earlier called Sidharth dynamic and said the country is gearing up to surprise him at every step. 
“From adventure activities to food and wine experiences, local culture to luxury indulgence, New Zealand is gearing up to surprise Sidharth at every step of his journey. We look forward to hosting him and making him feel at home in New Zealand,” he said.
